Text: The book of 2nd Corinthians is missing!

Thanks very much for this! By the way, it's NOT First Corinthians that's missing, but  First Thessalonians. 

Again, Thanks!

Great upload! Best dramatized Bible I've ever heard! And 2nd Corinthians is in there, it just got misplaced in the folder of the Colossians. After you've downloaded, just create a new folder with the name "08 2 Corinthians", open "Colossians", cut and paste. Voila!! :-)
..And by the way: 1st Thessalonians is in there, right where it's supposed to be.. :-)
goofy_root, is right and I am wrong. I made a mistake with another Bible I have that's also missing something. Second Corinthians IS missing, as stated earlier.
Great stuff.  Quality is good and can now listen to the bible in the car.
